# README

## Install Blast

Download blast from the [ncbi ftp
site](ftp://ftp.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/blast/executables/blast+/LATEST/) and install
it. For example by downloading the [compiled
binary](ftp://ftp.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/blast/executables/blast+/LATEST/ncbi-blast-2.2.30+-x64-linux.tar.gz)
and copying the content of the ``bin`` directory to ``/usr/local/bin``.

## Install the Python dependencies

The scripts depends on the ``xlrd`` module to parse the BLAST_samples.xlsx file.

```bash
pip install xlrd
```

The scripts depend on ``flask`` for creating the web server.

```bash
pip install flask
```

## Convert the XL spreadsheet into FastA format

```bash
mkdir -p data/{fasta,blastdb}
python scripts/convert_xlsx_to_fasta.py BLAST_samples_mod.xlsx > data/fasta/all_constructs.fasta
```

## Convert the FastA file into a blast database

```bash
sh make_db.sh
```

## Start the web service

```bash
python scripts/blast_app.py
```

## Open the web applicaiton

```bash
firefox client_example.html
```

Paste sequence below into the text box and press search.

```

```
